Title: XXVI.
Writer: Jonathan E. Steinberg (created by), Robert Levine (created by), Evan Bleiweiss, Marc Berzenski (staff writer), Lisa Schultz Boyd (staff writer), Joshua Rothenberger (staff writer)
Actors: Toby Stephens, Hannah New, Luke Arnold, Jessica Parker Kennedy
Plot: Rogers is attacked during a prisoner transport; Vane and Bonny race to save Rackham; the Walrus and her crew come under siege.
